text: (Muhminkale!) Unkalil yar (allahvin pataiyil) por ceytanar enpataiyum; allahvaiyum, avanutaiya tutaraiyum, muhminkalaiyum tavira (veru evaraiyum) antaranka nanparkalaka akkik kollavillai enpataiyum, allah (unkalaic cotittu) ariyata nilaiyil, ninkal vittuvitap patuvirkal enru ninaikkirirkala? Allah ninkal ceypavarrai(yellam nanku) arintavanakave irukkinran
